author: DJ Khaled
quote: The key is to make it.

author: DJ Khaled
quote: They don't want us to win, so we're gonna win more.

author: DJ Khaled
quote: You have to work hard for more success.

author: DJ Khaled
quote: Stay focused and secure your bag, because they want you to fail and they don't want us to win.

author: DJ Khaled
quote: When you stop making excuses and you work hard and go hard, you will be very successful.
